UniprotID	Q8WUX2
Accession	Q8WUX2;Q8WVI8
EntryName	CHAC2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Glutathione-specific gamma-glutamylcyclotransferase 2 (Gamma-GCG 2) (EC 4.3.2.7) (Cation transport regulator-like protein 2)
GeneName	CHAC2
Length	184
Function	Catalyzes the cleavage of glutathione into 5-oxo-L-proline and a Cys-Gly dipeptide. Acts specifically on glutathione, but not on other gamma-glutamyl peptides.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol
